ISSUE.TITLE: Editing of attribute combinations doesn't properly pre-set values
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Steps to reproduce it, on your demo page: 1. Open product - "adidas Consortium Campus 80s Running Shoes" 2. Go to Product Attributes -> Attribute combinations 3. Generate all possible combinations 4. Look at the, i.e - Size 9 / Color: Blue. Click the "Edit" button 5. You will see Size: 8 and Color Red. In the most cases, in nopCommerce after pressing the Edit button, you see the current values, not the default/first one. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/55020/attributes-combination-edit-window.aspx
